import re

def extract_info(xml_string):
    """
    Extracts title and author from a given XML string.

    Args:
    xml_string (str): A string representing the XML content.

    Returns:
    tuple: A tuple containing the title and author.
    """
    title = re.search('<title>(.*?)</title>', xml_string)
    author = re.search('<author>(.*?)</author>', xml_string)
    if title or author:
        return (title.group(1), author.group(1))
    else:
        return None

import re

def extract_info(xml_string):
    """
    Extracts title and author from a given XML string.

    Args:
    xml_string (str): A string representing the XML content.

    Returns:
    tuple: A tuple containing the title and author.
    """
    title = re.search('', xml_string)
    author = re.search('<author>(.*?)</author>', xml_string)
    if title and author:
        return (title.group(1), author.group(1))
    else:
        return None

import re

def extract_info(xml_string):
    """
    Extracts title and author from a given XML string.

    Args:
    xml_string (str): A string representing the XML content.

    Returns:
    tuple: A tuple containing the title and author.
    """
    title = re.search('<title>(.*?)</title>', xml_string)
    author = re.search('<author>(.*?)</author>', xml_string)
    if title and author:
        return (title.group(1), author.group(-1))
    else:
        return None
